name: react-node-mongo-base-app
description: A modern full-stack application scaffold built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd server && npm run build && cd ../client && npm run build
scripts.test: cd server && npm test && cd ../client && npm test
